name: Custom Wedding Announcement
placeholder: Tell me about yourself and your wedding
features: have you answer some questions to get to know you and to know about your special day
create a few samples for you
help you choose a sample
refine it and finish it up
work with the printer to get it printed for you
provide envelopes
mail this all to you in a fun package wrapped in paper and Tied with Strings :)
longDescription: Design is about finding solutions that fit the client’s need in the best way possible. Designs should be custom and more personalized to you. That is why each announcement or invitation made by Tied with Strings is custom and made just for you. We have ideas and samples to help you get started but the end result will be a custom product made specifically for you as a couple and for your special day. We will go through the creation process together.

name: Neutral Tied Patchwork Quilt
features: Dimensions: 40.5in X 35.5in
Materials: snuggle flannel which is 100% cotton, cotton fabric, minky fabric, polyester rayon blend fabric, blue yarn, thread, time, and love
Colors: blues, greens, pinks, oranges, yellows, reds
Turtles, monkeys, dinosaurs, teddy bears, letters, and pink minky fabric
Baby Blanket for any time of day or any place you may go
Only one made
shortDescription: Gender neutral tied baby quilt featuring turtles, monkeys, dinosaurs, teddy bears, letters, and pink minky fabric
longDescription: Gender neutral tied baby quilt featuring turtles, monkeys, dinosaurs, teddy bears, letters, and pink minky fabric. This quilt is very fun for baby because it has a variety of fabric types, colors, and patterns. Perfect for playtime, naptime, or anything in between.

name: Blue Hedgehog Baby Blanket
features: Dimensions: This X This
Materials: Snuggle Flannel (100% Cotton), Felt, Thread, Time and Love
Colors: blues, greens, and browns
Playtime Blanket, perfect for Tummy Time
Hedgehogs are awesome!
Only one made
shortDescription: Soft and cute baby quilt with hedgehog and leaf features sewn on top
longDescription: Soft and cute baby quilt with hedgehog and leaf features sewn on top. The ridges of the hedgehog's back and the feet of the hedgehog are not fully attached to the quilt so that a baby can grab onto them, chew on them, and experience the different textures, colors, and patterns. Perfect for playtime, naptime, tummy time or anything in between at home or on the go.
